page.title: 14SHOPPING IN BLANTYRE
page.content: The main shopping centre in the area is the{Clydeview Shopping Centre, Glasgow Road, Blantyre. The centre was opened in 1981 on what had previously been waste ground. At present the centre contains 1 superstore and a number of smaller shops including - 6 food shops, 4 non-food shops and a number of services e.g. optician, travel agent, bank, building society, lawyers, restaurant and post office. However, recently several non-food shops have closed down - 2 clothing, 1 video and 1 motorist shops and a public house. This highlights changing habits. The centre, and the {ASDA} superstore in particular, dominate shopping patterns in the area as our survey showed.(see page 15)
